meanings.definition: The middle of the night; 12 o'clock at night.
meanings.sent1: At midnight, the clock strikes twelve.
meanings.sent2: I always go to bed at midnight.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was playtime at midnight!
meanings.sent4: In the silence of midnight, the stars shine brightly.
meanings.sent5: The eerie stillness of midnight enveloped the town.

meanings.definition: The darkest hour of the night.
meanings.sent1: Midnight is when the night is at its darkest.
meanings.sent2: The forest is especially spooky at midnight.
meanings.sent3: The owl hooted loudly at midnight, scaring me.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the world are whispered at midnight.
meanings.sent5: The shadows dance mysteriously at the stroke of midnight.
